com.github.choonchernlim.betterPreconditions.preconditions

Class BetterPreconditions<C,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.choonchernlim.betterPreconditions.preconditions.BetterPreconditions<C,V>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanPreconditions, CollectionPreconditions, JodaTimePreconditions, ObjectPreconditions, StringPreconditions

    public abstract class BetterPreconditions<C,V>
extends Object
    Abstract class for all preconditions.
